Translations.Text: Niscaya allahe tomalokaka bahu ksetrata sahaya karaiche arau huna'inara yud'dhara dina yetiya tomalokaka utphulla karaichila tomalokara sankhyagaraisthata'i, kintu seya tomalokara kono kamata aha nachila arau prthirai prasasta horaa satbe'o tomalokara babe sankirna hai gaichila. Tara pichata tomaloke prstha pradarsana karai palayana karaichila

Tara pichata allahe te'omra phalara paraa te'omra raachulara oparata arau muminasakalara oparata prasanti nayila karaile arau enekuraa eta sain'ya bahini aratirna karaile yito tomaloke dekha poraa nachila. Arau kaphirasakalaka teraemi sasti dile, arau e'itorae'i achila kaphirasakalara pratiphala
Iyara pichato yara prati iccha allahe tara ta'oba kabula karaiba; arau allaha ati ksamasila, parama dayalu

He imandarasakala! Niscaya musbaraikasakala aparaitra, gatike e'i bacharara pichata sihamte yate machajidula haraamara nikatararti nahaya; arau yadi tomaloke daraidratara asanka karaa tente allahe iccha karaile te'omra nija anugrahata tomalokaka abharamukta karaiba. Niscaya allaha mahajnani, prajnamaya

Yisakalaka kitaba pradana karaa haiche sihamtara majata yisakale allahara prati bisbasa nakarae arau sesa dirasara prati'o imana posana nakarae lagate allaha arau te'omra raachule yi haraama karaiche seya haraama buli ganya nakarae; arau satya dbinara anusarana nakarae; sihamte nata hai nija hate jiya'iya nidiya laike sihamtara lagata yud'dha karaa
